concept.title: Deployment Options
concept.shortdesc: Multiple platforms and services can publish, pin and host the content to the decentralized web using IPFS.

conbody.p: This site's content publishing is automated with CI/CD on Github. In Fleek's dashboard, I provided information about my Git repo. Whenever changes are pushed to the prod branch, Fleek runs a deployment.
Fleek deploys the content to IPFS, generates a new IPFS hash (CID), and pins the content to ensure that it remains accessible.
Fleek provides a unique IPFS gateway URL (e.g., https://https://delicate-glitter-6121.on-fleek.app/). It supports providing a custom domain or a static IPNS namespace identifiers.
